GS24varlghku:12: antyenetā sahati ādirmadhyagānāṃ svasya ca saṃjñā syāt yathāṇiti a i u varṇānāṃ saṃjñā /
GS24varlghku:16: vāṃ kālo yasya so 'c kramād hrasvadīrghaplutasaṃjñaḥ syāt /
GS24varlghku:24: tadittham - a i u ṛ eṣāṃ varṇānāṃ pratyekamaṣṭādaśa bhedāḥ /
GS24varlghku:30: tālvādisthānamābhyantaraprayatnaścetyetaddvayaṃ yasya yena tulyaṃ tanmithaḥ savarṇasaṃjñaṃ syāt /
GS24varlghku:51: bāhyaprayatnastvekādaśadhā - vivāraḥ saṃvāraḥ śvāso nādo ghoṣo 'ghoṣo 'lpaprāṇomahāprāṇa udātto 'nudāttaḥ svaratiśceti /
GS24varlghku:67: ku cu ṭu tu pu ete uditaḥ /
GS24varlghku:84: ikaḥ sthāne yaṇ syādaci saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24varlghku:87: saptamīnirdeśena vidhīyamānaṃ kāryaṃ varṇāntareṇāvyavahatisya pūrvasya bodhyam //
GS24varlghku:92: acaḥ parasya yaro dve vā sto na tvaci /
GS24varlghku:93: iti dhakārasya dvitvena sudhdhy upāsya iti jāte //
GS24varlghku:105: ecaḥ kramāday av āy āv ete syuraci //
GS24varlghku:112: yakārādau pratyaye pare odautorav āv etau staḥ /
GS24varlghku:119: taḥ paro yasmātsa ca tātparaścoccāryamāṇasamakālasyaiva saṃjñā syāt //
GS24varlghku:121: avarṇādaci pare pūrvaparayoreko guṇa ādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24varlghku:130: tatsthāne yo 'ṇ sa raparaḥ sanneva pravartate /
GS24varlghku:172: pra parā apa sam anu ava nis nira dus dura vi āṅ ni adhi api ati su ut abhi prati para upi - ete prādayaḥ //
GS24varlghku:182: acāṃ madhye yo 'ntyaḥ sa ādiryasya taṭ ṭisaṃjñaṃ syāt /
GS24varlghku:195: akaḥ savarṇe 'ci pare pūrvaparayordīrgha ekādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24varlghku:203: loke vede caiṅantasya gorati vā prakṛtibhāvaḥ padānte /
GS24varlghku:246: odanto nipātaḥ pragṛhyaḥ syāt / aho īśāḥ //
GS24varlghku:248: sambuddhinimittaka okāro vā pragṛhyo 'vaidike itau pare /
GS24varlghku:250: maya uño vo vā // VLk_58 = P_8,3.33 //
GS24varlghku:259: acaḥ parābhyāṃ rephahakārābhyāṃ parasya yaro dve vā staḥ /
GS24varlghku:313: pañcamīnirdeśena kriyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ varṇāntareṇāvyavahitasya parasya jñeyam //
GS24varlghku:318: halaḥ parasya jharo vā lopaḥ savarṇe jhari //
GS24varlghku:326: nādasya ghoṣasya saṃvārasya mahāprāṇasya tādṛśo vargacaturthaḥ /
GS24varlghku:330: tad śiva ityatra dasya ścutvena jakāre kṛte khari ceti jakārasya cakāraḥ /
GS24varlghku:347: mo rāji samaḥ kvau // VLk_81 = P_8,3.25 //
GS24varlghku:348: kvibante rājatau pare samo masya ma eva syāt / samrāṭ //
GS24varlghku:350: mapare hakāre pare masya mo vā /
GS24varlghku:365: vā staḥ / (cayo dvitīyāḥ śari pauṣkarasāderiti vācyam) /
GS24varlghku:383: ṅamo hrasvādaci ṅamuṇ nityam // VLk_89 = P_8,3.32 //
GS24varlghku:384: hrasvātpare yo ṅam tadantaṃ yatpadaṃ tasmātparasyāco ṅamuṭ /
GS24varlghku:395: khari avasāne ca padāntasāya rephasya visargaḥ /
GS24varlghku:414: kupvoḥ eka epau ca // VLk_98 = P_8,3.37 //
GS24varlghku:415: kavarge pavarge ca visargasya eka epau staḥ,
GS24varlghku:444: bho bhago agho apūrvasya yo 'śi // VLk_108 = P_8,3.17 //
GS24varlghku:447: bhos bhagos aghos iti sāntā nipātāḥ /
GS24varlghku:465: manas ratha ityatra rutve kṛte haśi cetyutve rorīti lope ca prāpte //
GS24varlghku:472: akakārayoretattadoryaḥ sustasya lopo hali na tu nañsamāse /
GS24varlghku:479: sa ityasya sorlopaḥ syādaci pādaścellope satyeva pūryyeta /
GS24varlghku:486: dhātuṃ pratyayaṃ pratyayāntaṃ ca varjayitvā arthavacchabdasvarūpaṃ prātipadikasaṃjñaṃ syāt //
GS24varlghku:510: ekavibhaktau yāni sarūpāṇyeva dṛṣṭāni teṣāmeka eva śiṣyate //
GS24varlghku:512: akaḥ prathamādvitīyayoraci pūrvasavarṇadīrgha ekādeśaḥ syāt / iti prāpte //
GS24varlghku:528: yaḥ pratyayo yasmāt kriyate tadādiśabdasvarūpaṃ tasminnaṅgaṃ syāt //
GS24varlghku:539: pūrvasavarṇadīrghātparo yaḥ śasaḥ sastasya naḥ syātpuṃsi //
GS24varlghku:541: aṭ kavargaḥ pavargaḥ āṅ num etairvyastairyathāsaṃbhavaṃ militaiśca vyavadhāne 'pi raṣābhyāṃ parasya nasya ṇaḥ samānapade / iti prāpte //
GS24varlghku:577: iṇkubhyāṃ parasyāpadāntasyādeśasya pratyayāvayavasya yaḥ sastasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ /
GS24varlghku:582: sarva viśva ubha ubhaya ḍatara ḍatama anya anyatara itara tvat tva nema sama sima /
GS24varlghku:586: tyad tad yad etad idam adas eka dvi yuṣmad asmad bhavatu kim //
GS24varlghku:627: eteṣāṃ vyavasthāyāmasaṃjñāyāṃ ca sarvanāmasaṃjñā gaṇasūtrātsarvatra yā prāptā sā jasi vā syāt /
GS24varlghku:636: jñātidhanānyavācinaḥ svaśabdasya prāptā saṃjñā jasi vā /
GS24varlghku:642: bāhye paridhānīye cārthe 'ntaraśabdasya prāptā saṃjñā jasi vā /
GS24varlghku:675: dīrghājjasi ici ca pare pūrvasavarṇadīrgho na syāt /
GS24varlghku:685: yādiṣvajādiṣu ca kappratyayāvadhiṣu svādiṣvasarvanāmasthāneṣu pūrvaṃ bhasaṃjñaṃ syāt //
GS24varlghku:687: ita ūrdhvaṃ kaḍārāḥ karmadhāraya ityataḥ prāgekasyaikaiva saṃjñā jñeyā /
GS24varlghku:733: halantātparaṃ dīrghau yau ṅyāpau tadantācca paraṃ sutisītyetadapṛktaṃ hal lupyate //
GS24varlghku:735: prātipadikasaṃjñakaṃ yatpadaṃ tadantasya nasya lopaḥ / sakhā //
GS24varlghku:748: khitiśabdābhyāṃ khītīśabdābhyāṃ kṛtayaṇādeśābhyāṃ parasya ṅasiṅasorata uḥ / sakhyuḥ //
GS24varlghku:771: lumatā śabdena lupte tannimittamaṅgakāryaṃ na syāt /
GS24varlghku:834: śnu pratyayāntasyevarṇovarṇāntasya dhātorbhrū ityasya cāṅgasya ceyaṅuvaṅau sto 'jādau pratyaye pare / iti prāpte //
GS24varlghku:836: dhātvavayavasaṃyogapūrvo na bhavati ya ivarṇastadanto yo dhātustadantasyānekāco 'ṅgasya yaṇajādau pratyaye /
GS24varlghku:874: ṛto 'ṅgasya guṇo ṅau sarvanāmasthāne ca / iti prāpte -- .
GS24varlghku:876: ṛdantānām uśanasādīnām ca anaṅ syāt asaṃbuddhau sau //
GS24varlghku:906: dhātvavayavasaṃyogapūrvo na bhavati ya uvarṇastadanto yo dhātustadantasyānekāco 'ṅgasya yaṇ syādaci supi /
GS24varlghku:1057: ami śasi ca striyā iyaṅ vā syāt /
GS24varlghku:1069: iyaṅuvaṅoḥ sthitiryayostāvīdūtau nadīsaṃjñau na sto na tu strī /
GS24varlghku:1074: iyaṅuvaṅsthānau stryākhyau yū āmi vā nadīsaṃjñau sto na tu strī /
GS24varlghku:1107: ityallope prāpte (auṅaḥ śyāṃ pratiṣedho vācyaḥ) / jñāne //
GS24varlghku:1113: jhalantasyājantasya ca klībasya num syāt sarvanāmasthāne //
GS24varlghku:1165: aṅgāvayavo 'sarvanāmasthānayajādisvādiparo yo 'n tasyākārasya lopo vā syāṅat ṅiśyoḥ parayoḥ /
GS24varlghku:1218: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya sdhvoḥ // VLk_254 = P_8,2.37 //
GS24varlghku:1219: dhātvavayavasyaikāco jhaṣantasya baśo bhaṣ se dhve padānte ca /
GS24varlghku:1225: eṣāṃ hasya vā gho jhali padānte ca /
GS24varlghku:1243: yaṇaḥ sthāne prayujyamāno ya ik sa saṃprasāraṇasaṃjñaḥ syāt //
GS24varlghku:1253: asya num syāt sau pare / anaḍvān //
GS24varlghku:1282: raṣābhyāṃ no ṇaḥ samānapade // VLk_268 = P_8,4.1 //
GS24varlghku:1284: acaḥ parābhyāṃ rephahakārābhyāṃ parasya yaro dve vā staḥ /
GS24varlghku:1291: aci pare śaro na dve staḥ / caturṣu //
GS24varlghku:1344: nasya lopo na ṅau sambuddhau ca /
GS24varlghku:1351: subvidhau svaravidhau saṃjñāvidhau kṛti tugvidhau ca nalopo 'siddho nānyatra - rājāśva ityādau /
GS24varlghku:1373: ekājuttaparadaṃ yasya tasminsamāse pūrvapadasthānnimittātparasya pratipadikāntanumvibhaktisthasya nasya ṇaḥ /
GS24varlghku:1376: ñiti ṇiti pratyaye nakāre ca pare hanterhakārasya kutvam /
GS24varlghku:1382: maghavanśabdasya vā tṛ ityantādeśaḥ / ṛ it //
GS24varlghku:1398: saṃprasāraṇe parataḥ pūrvasya yaṇaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ na syāt /
GS24varlghku:1400: ata eva jñāpakādantyasya yaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃprasāraṇam /
GS24varlghku:1406: nañā rahitasyārvannityasyāṅgasya tṛ ityantādeśo na tu sau /
GS24varlghku:1425: ṣāntā nāntā ca saṃkhyā ṣaṭsaṃjñā syāt /
GS24varlghku:1440: aṣṭabhya iti vaktavye kṛtātvanirdeśo jaśśasorviṣaye ātvaṃ jñāpayati /
GS24varlghku:1456: atra dhātvadhikāre tiṅbhinnaḥ pratyayaḥ kṛtsaṃjñaḥ syāt //
GS24varlghku:1490: parāvupapade vrajeḥ kvip syāddīrghaśca padānte ṣatvamapi /
GS24varlghku:1494: viśvaśabdasya dīrgho 'ntādeśaḥ syādsau rāṭśabde ca pare /
GS24varlghku:1499: padānte jhali ca yaḥ saṃyogastadādyoḥ skorlopaḥ /
GS24varlghku:1502: jhalāṃ jaś jhaśi iti śasya jaḥ /
GS24varlghku:1574: padātparayorapādādau sthitayoḥ ṣaṣṭhyādiviśiṣṭayorvāṃ nau ityādeśau staḥ //
GS24varlghku:1581: śrīśastavāvatu māpīha dattātte me 'pi śarma saḥ /
GS24varlghku:1582: svāmī te me 'pi sa hariḥ pātu vāmapi nau vibhuḥ //
GS24varlghku:1583: sukhaṃ vāṃ nau dadātvīśaḥ patirvāmapi nau hariḥ /
GS24varlghku:1584: so 'vyādvo naḥ śivaṃ vo no dadyāt sevyo 'tra vaḥ sa naḥ //
GS24varlghku:1595: pācchabdāntaṃ yadaṅgaṃ bhaṃ tadavayavasya pācchabdasya padādeśaḥ //
GS24varlghku:1602: aniditāṃ hala upadhāyāḥ kṅiti // VLk_336 = P_6,4.24 //
GS24varlghku:1656: sāntasaṃyogasya mahataśca yo nakārastasyopadhāyā dīrgho 'sambuddhau sarvanāmasthāne /
GS24varlghku:1663: atvantasyopadhāyā dīrgho dhātubhinnāsantasya cāsambuddhau sau pare /
GS24varlghku:1676: ṣāṣṭhadvitvaprakaraṇe ye dve vihite te ubhe samudite abhyastasaṃjñe staḥ // ,
GS24varlghku:1682: ṣaḍdhātavo 'nye jakṣitiśca saptama ete abhyastasaṃjñāḥ syuḥ /
GS24varlghku:1734: etaiḥ pratyekaṃ vyavadhāne 'pi iṇkubhyāṃ parasya sasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ /
GS24varlghku:1779: adaso 'sāntasya dātparasya udūtau sto dasya maśca /
GS24varlghku:1785: adaso dātparasyaita īddasya ca mo bahvarthoktau /
GS24varlghku:1793: nābhāve kartavye kṛte ca mubhāvo nāsiddhaḥ /
GS24varlghku:1807: naho hasya dhaḥ syājjhali padānte ca //
GS24varlghku:1957: abhyastātparo yaḥ śatā tadantasya klībasya vā num sarvanāmasthāne /
GS24varlghku:1960: avarṇāntādaṅgātparo yaḥ śaturavayastadantasya num vā śīnadyoḥ /
GS24varlghku:1963: śapśyanorātparo yaḥ śaturavayavastadantasya nityaṃ num śīnadyoḥ /
GS24varlghku:2166: sadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu /
GS24varlghku:2167: vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tadavyayam //
GS24varlghku:2169: āpaṃ caiva halantānāṃ yathā vācā niśā diśā //
GS24varlghku:2178: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ // VLk_375 = P_3,4.69 //
GS24varlghku:2179: lakārāḥ sakarmakebhyaḥ karmaṇi kartari ca syurakarmakebhyo bhāve kartari ca //
GS24varlghku:2185: kartṛ vivakṣāyāṃ bhū l iti sthite --- .
GS24varlghku:2198: ātmanepada nimitta hīnāddhātoḥ kartari parasmaipadaṃ syāt //
GS24varlghku:2202: labdha prathamādi saṃjñāni tiṅastrīṇi trīṇi pratyekamekavacanādi saṃjñāni syuḥ //
GS24varlghku:2203: yuṣmadyupapade samānādhikaraṇe sthāninyapi madhyamaḥ // VLk_385 = P_1,4.105 //
GS24varlghku:2247: liṭi pare 'nabhyāsadhātvavayasyaikācaḥ prathamasya dve sta ādibhūtādacaḥ parasya tu dvitīyasya /
GS24varlghku:2250: atra ye dve vihite tayoḥ pūrvo 'bhyāsasaṃjñaḥ syāt //
GS24varlghku:2260: jhaśāṃ jaśaḥ khayāṃ cara iti vivekaḥ /
GS24varlghku:2275: dhātoḥ sya tāsi etau pratyayau sto ḷluṭoḥ parataḥ /
GS24varlghku:2279: tiṅśidbhyo 'nyo dhātoriti vihitaḥ pratyaya etatsaṃjñaḥ syāt / iṭ //
GS24varlghku:2284: tāserasteśca sasya lopassyāt sādau pratyaye pare /
GS24varlghku:2348: anadyatana bhūtārtha vṛtter dhātor laṅ syāt //
GS24varlghku:2368: ataḥ parasya sārvadhātukāvayavasya yās ityasya iy / guṇaḥ //
GS24varlghku:2408: bhū sū etayoḥ sārvadhātuke tiṅi pare guṇo na /
GS24varlghku:2420: mā sma bhavat / mā sma bhūt //
GS24varlghku:2422: hetuhetumadbhāvādi liṅnimittaṃ tatra bhaviṣyatyarthe ḷṅ syāt kriyāyā aniṣpattau gamyamānāyām /
GS24varlghku:2458: iṭaḥ parasya sasya lopaḥ syādīṭi pare /
GS24varlghku:2509: upadhāyā ato vṛddhiḥ syāt ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye pare /
GS24varlghku:2539: liṇnimittādeśādikaṃ na bhavati yadaṅgaṃ tadavayavasyāsaṃyuktahalmadhyasthasyāta etvamabhyāsalopaśca kiti liṭi /
GS24varlghku:2612: sanādayaḥ kamerṇiṅantāḥ pratyayā ante yeṣāṃ te dhātusaṃjñakāḥ /
GS24varlghku:2633: dvitvanimitte 'ci aca ādeśo na dvitve kartavye /
GS24varlghku:2697: krādibhya eva liṭa iṇna syādanyasmādaniṭo 'pi syāt //
GS24varlghku:2699: upadeśe 'janto yo dhātustāsau nityāniṭ tatasthala iṇna //
GS24varlghku:2701: upadeśe 'kāravatastāsau nityāniṭaḥ parasya thala iṇna syāt //
GS24varlghku:2703: tāsau nityāniṭa ṛdantādeva thalo neṭ bhāradvājasya mate /
GS24varlghku:2718: ajantāṅgasya dīrgho yādau pratyaye na tu kṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ / kṣīyāt //
GS24varlghku:2742: ebhyaḥ śyanvā kartrarthe sārvadhātuke pare / pakṣe śap //
GS24varlghku:2761: āto lopa iṭi ca // VLk_491 = P_6,4.64 //
GS24varlghku:2776: ghusaṃjñakānāṃ māsthādīnāṃ ca etvaṃ syādārdhadhātuke kiti liṅi /
GS24varlghku:2788: upadeśe ejantasya dhātorātvaṃ na tu śiti /
GS24varlghku:2795: ghumāsthāderanyasya saṃyogāderdhātorāta etvaṃ vārdhadhātuke kiti liṅi /
GS24varlghku:2798: eṣāṃ sak syādebhyaḥ sica iṭ syātparasmaipadeṣu /
GS24varlghku:2820: arteḥ saṃyogāderṛdantasya ca guṇaḥ syādyaki yādāvārdhadhātuke liṅi ca /
GS24varlghku:2826: śruvaḥ śṛ ityādeśaḥ syāt śnupratyayaśca / śṛṇoti //
GS24varlghku:2836: asaṃyogapūrvasya pratyayokārasya lopo vā mvoḥ parayoḥ /
GS24varlghku:3031: ām anta ālu āyya itnu iṣṇu eṣu ṇerayādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24varlghku:3052: iṇaḥ paro ya iṭ tataḥ pareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ dhasya vā ḍhaḥ /
GS24varlghku:3058: ṇyantāt śryādibhyaśca cleścaṅ syāt kartrarthe luṅi pare /
GS24varlghku:3063: caṅpare ṇau yadaṅgaṃ tasyopadhāyā hrasvaḥ syāt //
GS24varlghku:3065: caṅi pare anabhyāsasya dhātvavayavasyaikācaḥ prathamasya dve sto 'jāderdvitīyasya //
GS24varlghku:3067: caṅpare ṇau yadaṅgaṃ tasya yo 'bhyāso laghuparaḥ,
GS24varlghku:3082: day ay ās ebhya ām syālliṭi /
GS24varlghku:3121: vṛtādibhyaḥ pañcabhyo vā parasmaipadaṃ syātsye sani ca //
GS24varlghku:3133: śaserdadervakārādīnāṃ guṇaśabdena vihito yo 'kārastasya ettvābhyāsalopau na /
GS24varlghku:3147: eṣāmata ettvamabhyāsalopaśca syāt kiti liṭi seṭi thali ca /
GS24varlghku:3190: śe yaki yādāvārdhadhātuke liṅi ca ṛto riṅ ādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24varlghku:3239: vacyādīnāṃ grahyādīnāṃ cābhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ liṭi / iyāja //
GS24varlghku:3310: ad ṛ vyeñ ebhyasthalo nityamiṭ syāt /
GS24varlghku:3348: anunāsikāntānāmeṣāṃ vanateśca lopaḥ syājjhalādau kiti ṅiti pare /
GS24varlghku:3350: tanu kṣaṇu kṣiṇu ṛṇu tṛṇu ghṛṇu vanu manu tanotyādayaḥ /
GS24varlghku:3415: lugviṣaye uto vṛddhiḥ piti halādau sārvadhātuke natvabhyastasya /
GS24varlghku:3474: ayaṃ sārvadhātuke eva prayoktavyaḥ // vida jñāne // 16 //
GS24varlghku:3494: vetterloṭi ām guṇābhāvo loṭo luk loḍantakarotyanuprayogaśca vā nipātyate puruṣavacane na vivakṣite //
GS24varlghku:3529: upasargeṇaḥ prādusaścāsteḥ sasya ṣo yakāre 'ci ca pare /
GS24varlghku:3578: upasargātparasya iṇo 'ṇo hrasva ārdhadhātuke kiti liṅi /
GS24varlghku:3702: iksamīpāddhalaḥ parau jhalādī liṅsicau kitau stastaṅi / dhukṣīṣṭa //
GS24varlghku:3704: igupadho yaḥ śalantastasmādaniṭaścleḥ ksādeśaḥ syāt / adhukṣat //
GS24varlghku:3745: bruvaḥ pañcānāmādita āho bruvaḥ // VLk_596 = P_3,4.84 //
GS24varlghku:3746: bruvo laṭastibādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ ṇalādayaḥ pañca vā syurbruvaścāhādeśaḥ /
GS24varlghku:3753: bruvaḥ parasya halādeḥ pita īṭ syāt /
GS24varlghku:3796: acaḥ parāḥ saṃyogādayo nadarā dvirna bhavanti /
GS24varlghku:3821: iḍādau sici vā vṛddhiḥ parasmaipade pare /
GS24varlghku:3845: ebhyo liṭi ām vā syādāmi ślāviva kāryaṃ ca /
GS24varlghku:3893: aṅgāvayavauṣṭhyapūrvo ya ṝt tadantasyāṅgasya ut syāt //
GS24varlghku:3899: eṣāṃ liṭi hrasvo vā syāt / papratuḥ //
GS24varlghku:3901: taudādika ṛccher ṛdhātor ṝtāṃ ca guṇo liṭi /
GS24varlghku:3904: vṛṅvṛñbhyāmṝdantācceṭo dīrgho vā syānna tu liṭi /
GS24varlghku:3921: śnābhyastayorāta īt syāt sārvadhātuke kṅiti halādau na tu ghoḥ / jahītaḥ //
GS24varlghku:3942: bhṛñ māṅ ohāṅ eṣāṃ trayāṇāmabhyāsasya itsyāt ślau /
GS24varlghku:4005: dārūpā dhārūpāśca dhātavo ghusaṃjñāḥ syurdāpdaipau vinā /
GS24varlghku:4020: dviruktasya jhaṣantasya dhāño baśo bhaṣ syāttayoḥ sdhvośca parataḥ /
GS24varlghku:4041: ṇijāṃ trayāṇāṃ guṇaḥ ślau // VLk_629 = P_7,4.57 //
GS24varlghku:4100: eṣāṃ kiti liṭi seṭi thali ca etvābhyāsalopau vā /
GS24varlghku:4159: radh naś tṛp dṛp druh muh ṣṇuh ṣṇih ebhyo valādyārdhadhātukasya veṭ syāt / neśitha //
GS24varlghku:4213: anayorupadhāyā vṛddhirna syācciṇi ñṇiti kṛti ca /
GS24varlghku:4296: abhyāsātparasya kutvaṃ vā syātsani liṭi ca /
GS24varlghku:4303: abhyāsasya śarpūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante 'nye halo lupyante /
GS24varlghku:4319: paramapi svaratyādivikalpaṃ bādhitvā purastātpratiṣedha kāṇḍārambha sāmarthyādanena niṣedhe prāpte krādiniyamānnityamiṭ /
GS24varlghku:4348: bhrasjo rephasyopadhāyāśca sthāne ramāgamo vā syādārdhadhātuke /
GS24varlghku:4394: muc lip vid lup sic kṛt khid piśāṃ num syāt śe pare /
GS24varlghku:4710: tṛhaḥ śnami kṛte imāgamo halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24varlghku:4720: padāntasya sasya daḥ syāttipi na tvasteḥ /
GS24varlghku:4725: padāntasya dhātoḥ sasya ruḥ syādvā, pakṣe daḥ /
GS24varlghku:4846: upratyayāntasya kṛño 'kārasya uḥ syāt sārvadhātuke kṅiti / kurutaḥ //
GS24varlghku:4850: karoteḥ pratyayokārasya nityaṃ lopo mvoḥ parayoḥ /
GS24varlghku:4868: samparipūrvasya karoteḥ suṭ syād bhūṣaṇe saṃghāte cārthe /
GS24varlghku:4970: halaḥ parasya śnaḥ śānajādeśaḥ syāddhau pare / stabhāna //
GS24varlghku:4987: pūñ lūñ stṝñ kṝñ vṝñ dhūñ śṝ pṝ vṝ bhṝ mṝ dṝ jṝ jhṝ dhṝ nṝ kṝ ṝ gṝ jyā rī lī vlī plīnāṃ caturviṃśateḥ śiti hrasvaḥ /
GS24varlghku:5035: ekāco grahervihitasyeṭo dīrgho na tu liṭi /
GS24varlghku:5094: paranimitto 'jādeśaḥ sthānivat syātsthāni bhūtādacaḥ pūrvatvena dṛṣṭasya vidhau kartavye /
GS24varlghku:5113: sani pare yadaṅgaṃ tadavayavābhyāsokārasya itsyāt pavargayaṇjakāreṣvavarṇapareṣu parataḥ //
GS24varlghku:5129: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samānakartṛkādicchāyāṃ vā // VLk_708 = P_3,1.7 //
GS24varlghku:5133: sannantasya yaṅantasya ca dhātoranabhyāsasya prathamasyaikāco dve sto 'jādestu dvitīyasya /
GS24varlghku:5153: graherguherugantācca sana iṇ na syāt / bubhūṣati //
GS24varlghku:5156: dhātorekāco halādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ // VLk_714 = P_3,1.22 //
GS24varlghku:5157: paunaḥpunye bhṛśārthe ca dyotye dhātorekāco halāderyaṅ syāt //
GS24varlghku:5159: abhyāsasya guṇo yaṅi yaṅluki ca parataḥ /
GS24varlghku:5165: gatyarthātkauṭilya eva yaṅ syānna tu kriyāsamabhihāre //
GS24varlghku:5195: yaṅlugantātparasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasyeḍ vā syāt /
GS24varlghku:5230: iṣikarmaṇa eṣituḥ saṃbandhinaḥ subantādicchāyāmarthe kyac pratyayo vā syāt //
GS24varlghku:5237: kyaci kyaṅi ca nāntameva padaṃ nānyat /
GS24varlghku:5265: anunāsikāntasyopadhāyā dīrghaḥ syātkvau jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24varlghku:5326: sanaḥ pūrvo yo dhātustena tulyaṃ sannantādapyātmanepadaṃ syāt /
GS24varlghku:5356: kartṛge ca phale gandhanādau ca parasmaipadaṃ syāt /
GS24varlghku:5382: tiṅvācyakriyāyā adravya rūpatvena dvitvādyapratīterna dvivacanādi kiṃtvekavacanamevotsargataḥ /
GS24varlghku:5384: syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇorupadeśe 'jjhanagrahadṛśāṃ vā ciṇvadiṭ ca // VLk_756 = P_6,4.62 //
GS24varlghku:5385: upadeśe yo 'c tadantānāṃ hanādīnāṃ ca ciṇīvāṅgakāryaṃ vā syātsyādiṣu bhāvakarmaṇorgamyamānayoḥ syādīnāmiḍāgamaśca /
GS24varlghku:5456: ādantānāṃ yugāgamaḥ syācciṇi ñṇiti kṛti ca /
GS24varlghku:5469: yadā karmaiva kartṛtvena vivakṣitaṃ tadā sakarmakāṇāmapyakarmakatvātkartari bhāve ca lakāraḥ //
GS24varlghku:5495: vartamāne ye pratyayā uktāste vartamānasāmīpye bhūte bhaviṣyati ca vā syuḥ /
GS24varlghku:5529: asmindhātvadhikāre 'sarūpo 'pavādapratyaya utsargasya bādhako vā syāt stryadhikāroktaṃ vinā //
GS24varlghku:5549: vidhervidhānaṃ bahudhā samīkṣya caturvidhaṃ bāhulakaṃ vadanti // 1 //
GS24varlghku:5563: hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk // VLk_780 = P_6,1.71 //
GS24varlghku:5578: cajoḥ kutvaṃ syāt ghiti ṇyati ca pare //
GS24varlghku:5611: gehe kartari graheḥ kaḥ syāt / gṛham //
GS24varlghku:5638: āduttarasyānavyayasya visargasya samāse nityaṃ sādeśaḥ karotyādiṣu pareṣu /
GS24varlghku:5645: aruṣo dviṣato 'jantasya ca mumāgamaḥ syātkhidante pare na tvavyayasya /
GS24varlghku:5652: manin kvanip vanip vic ete pratyayā dhātoḥ syuḥ //
GS24varlghku:5675: svakarmake manane varttamānānmanyateḥ supi khaś syāt cāṇṇiniḥ /
GS24varlghku:5711: radābhyāṃ niṣṭhāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ // VLk_819 = P_8,2.42 //
GS24varlghku:5712: radābhyāṃ parasya niṣṭhātasya naḥ syāt niṣṭhāpekṣayā pūrvasya dhātordasya ca //
GS24varlghku:5728: aṅgāvayavāddhalaḥ paraṃ yatsaṃprasāraṇaṃ tadantasya dīrghaḥ / jīnaḥ //
GS24varlghku:5747: ghusaṃjñakasya dā ityasya dath syāt tādau kiti /
GS24varlghku:5756: aprathamāntena samānādhikaraṇe laṭa etau vā staḥ /
GS24varlghku:5762: laḍityanuvartamāne punarlaḍgrahaṇāt prathamāsāmānādhikaraṇye 'pi kvacit / san dvijaḥ //
GS24varlghku:5800: satukkasya chasya vasya ca krāmāt ś ūṭh ityādeśau sto 'nunāsike kvau jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24varlghku:5827: puvaḥ saṃjñāyām // VLk_850 = P_3,2.185 // WEITER S. 139
GS24varlghku:5841: ete vartamāne saṃjñāyām ca bahulaṃ syuḥ /
GS24varlghku:5857: akartari ca kārake saṃjñāyām // VLk_855 = P_3,3.19 //
GS24varlghku:5938: puṃsi saṃjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prāyeṇa // VLk_875 = P_3,3.188 //
GS24varlghku:5953: eṣu duḥkhasukhārtheṣūpapadeṣu khal tayoreveti bhāve karmaṇi ca /
GS24varlghku:5960: alaṃkhalvoḥ pratiṣedhayoḥ prācāṃ ktvā // VLk_881 = P_3,4.18 //
GS24varlghku:5980: ivarṇovarṇopadhāddhalādeḥ ralantātparau ktvāsanau seṭau vā kitau staḥ /
GS24varlghku:5999: ābhīkṣṇye dyotye pūrvaviṣaye ṇamul syāt ktvā ca //
GS24varlghku:6001: ābhīkṣṇye vīpsāyāṃ ca dyotye padasya dvitvaṃ syāt /
GS24varlghku:6024: prātipadikārthamātre liṅgamātrādyādhikye parimāṇamātre saṃkhyāmātre ca prathamā syāt /
GS24varlghku:6038: kartuḥ kriyayā āptumiṣṭatamaṃ kārakaṃ karmasaṃjñaṃ syāt //
GS24varlghku:6042: abhihite tu karmādau prathamā - hariḥ sevyate /
GS24varlghku:6059: grāmamajāṃ nayati harati karṣati vahati vā /
GS24varlghku:6069: anabhihite kartari karaṇe ca tṛtīyā syāt /
GS24varlghku:6072: karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa sampradānam // VLk_899 = P_1,4.32 //
GS24varlghku:6073: dānasya karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa sampradānasaṃjñaḥ syāt //
GS24varlghku:6083: tena daityebhyo hariralaṃ prabhuḥ samarthaḥ śakta ityādi //
GS24varlghku:6086: apāyo viśleṣastasminsādhye yad dhruvamavadhibhūtaṃ kārakaṃ tadapādānaṃ syāt //
GS24varlghku:6119: sa ca viśeṣasaṃjñā vinirmuktaḥ kevalasamāsaḥ prathamaḥ // 1 //
GS24varlghku:6127: padasaṃbandhī yo vidhiḥ sa samarthāśrito bodhyaḥ //
GS24varlghku:6129: kaḍārāḥ karmadhāraya ityataḥ prāk samāsa ityadhikriyate //
GS24varlghku:6137: tatra pūrvaṃ bhūta iti laukikaḥ “pūrva am bhūta su';
GS24varlghku:6148: vibhaktyarthādiṣu vartamānamavyayaṃ subantena saha nityaṃ samasyate so 'vyayībhāvaḥ /
GS24varlghku:6151: vibhaktau, hari ṅi adhi iti sthite //
GS24varlghku:6183: sahasya saḥ syādavyayībhāve na tu kāle /
GS24varlghku:6222: dvitīyāntaṃ śritādiprakṛtikaiḥ subantaiḥ saha vā samasyate sa ca tatpuruṣaḥ /
GS24varlghku:6225: tṛtīyāntaṃ tṛtīyāntārthakṛtaguṇavacanenārthena ca saha vā prāgvat /
GS24varlghku:6231: kartari karaṇe ca tṛtīyā kṛdantena bahulaṃ prāgvat /
GS24varlghku:6237: caturthyantārthāya yat tadvācinā arthādibhiśca caturthyaṃntaṃ vā prāgvat /
GS24varlghku:6283: taddhitārthe viṣaye uttarapade ca parataḥ samāhāre ca vācye diksaṃkhye prāgvat /
GS24varlghku:6284: pūrvasyāṃ śālāyāṃ bhavaḥ - pūrvā śālā iti samāse jāte (sarvanāmno vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ) //
GS24varlghku:6288: ñiti ṇiti ca taddhiteṣvacāmāderaco vṛddhiḥ syāt /
GS24varlghku:6291: pañca gāvo dhanaṃ yasyeti tripade bahuvrīhau /
GS24varlghku:6294: go 'ntāttatpuruṣāṭṭac syāt samāsānto na tu taddhitaluki /
GS24varlghku:6322: naikadhetyādau tu naśabdena saha supsupeti samāsaḥ //
GS24varlghku:6337: vigrahe yanniyatavibhaktikaṃ tadupasarjanasaṃjñaṃ syānna tu tasya pūrvanipātaḥ //
GS24varlghku:6339: upasarjanaṃ yo gośabdaḥ strīpratyayāntaṃ ca tadantasya prātipadikasya hrasvaḥ syāt /
GS24varlghku:6348: saptamyante pade karmaṇītyādau vācyatvena sthitaṃ yatkumbhādi tadvācakaṃ padamupapadasaṃjñaṃ syāt //
GS24varlghku:6355: (pa.) gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ /
GS24varlghku:6377: mahata ākāro 'ntādeśaḥ syātsamānādhikaraṇe uttarapade jātīye ca pare /
GS24varlghku:6382: ātsyāt / dvau ca daśa ca dvādaśa /
GS24varlghku:6401: ardharcādayaḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi klībe ca syuḥ /
GS24varlghku:6413: anekaṃ prathamāntamanyasya padasyārthe vartamānaṃ vā samasyate sa bahuvrīhiḥ //
GS24varlghku:6415: saptamyantaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca bahuvrīhau pūrvaṃ syāt /
GS24varlghku:6433: tulye pravṛttinimitte yaduktapuṃskaṃ tasmātpara ūṅo'bhāvo yatra tathābhūtasya strīvācakaśabdasya
GS24varlghku:6434: puṃvācakasyeva rūpaṃ syāt samānādhikaraṇe strīliṅge uttarapade na tu pūraṇyāṃ priyādau ca parataḥ /
GS24varlghku:6442: kalyāṇī pañcamī yāsāṃ rātrīṇāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇī pañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24varlghku:6484: eṣviṇa uttarasya visargasya ṣo 'nyasya tu saḥ /
GS24varlghku:6488: iṇa uttarasya visargasya ṣaḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu pareṣu /
GS24varlghku:6499: anekaṃ subantaṃ cārthe vartamānaṃ vā samasyate sa dvandvaḥ /
GS24varlghku:6545: ṛgādyantasya samāsasya apratyayo 'ntāvayavo 'kṣe yā dhūstadantasya tu na /
GS24varlghku:6575: halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ // VLk_1003 = P_4,1.85 //
GS24varlghku:6576: halaḥ parasya yamo lopaḥ syād vā yami /
GS24varlghku:6595: dhānyānāṃ bhavana ityataḥ prāgartheṣu strīpuṃsābhyāṃ kramānnañsnañau staḥ /
GS24varlghku:6598: ṣaṣṭhyantātkṛtasandheḥ samarthādapatyer'the uktā vakṣyamāṇāśca pratyayā vā syuḥ //
GS24varlghku:6615: gotre yadyañantamañantaṃ ca tadavayavayoretayorluk syāttatkṛte bahutve na tu striyām /
GS24varlghku:6617: jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā // VLk_1013 = P_4,1.163 //
GS24varlghku:6618: vaṃśye pitrādau jīvati pautrāderyadapatyaṃ caturthādi tadyuvasaṃjñameva syāt //
GS24varlghku:6671: yādau taddhite pare 'n prakṛtyā syānna tu bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24varlghku:6698: bahuṣvartheṣu tadrājasya luk tadarthakṛte bahutve na tu striyām /
GS24varlghku:6718: pūrveṇa vihitasya lup syāt ṣaṣṭidaṇḍātmakasya kālasyāvāntaraviśeṣaścenna gamyate /
GS24varlghku:6743: akṛdyakāre asārvadhātuke yakāre cvau ca pare ṛdantāṅgasya rīṅādeśaḥ /
GS24varlghku:6778: na yvābhyām padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyāmaic // VLk_1057 = P_7,3.3 //
GS24varlghku:6779: padāntābhyāṃ yakāravakārābhyāṃ parasya na vṛddhiḥ kiṃtu tābhyāṃ pūrvau kramādaijāvāgamau staḥ/
GS24varlghku:6836: iha prakṛtiviśeṣād ghādayaṣṭyuṭyulantāḥ pratyayā ucyante teṣāṃ jātādayor'thaviśeṣāḥ samartha vibhaktayaśca vakṣyante //
GS24varlghku:6885: maparyantayoretayorekārthavācinostvamau staḥ pratyaye uttarapade ca parataḥ /
GS24varlghku:6963: srugghnaṃ gacchati sraugdhnaḥ panthā dūto vā //
GS24varlghku:7000: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam // VLk_1120 = P_4,4.2 //
GS24varlghku:7001: akṣairdīvyati khanati jayati jito vā ākṣikaḥ //
GS24varlghku:7043: bhasya kurchuroścopadhāyā iko dīrgho na syāt /
GS24varlghku:7113: tena tulyaṃ kriyā cedvatiḥ // VLk_1154 = P_5,1.115 //
GS24varlghku:7152: cādbhāve / jaḍasya bhāvaḥ karma vā jāḍyam /
GS24varlghku:7165: dhānyānāṃ bhavane kṣetre khañ // VLk_1167 = P_5,2.1 //
GS24varlghku:7174: tadasya saṃjātaṃ tārakādibhya itac // VLk_1170 = P_5,2.36 //
GS24varlghku:7188: dṛgdṛśavatuṣu idama īś kimaḥ kiḥ / kiyān / iyān //
GS24varlghku:7229: tāntasāntau bhasaṃjñau sto matvarthe pratyaye pare /
GS24varlghku:7282: dikchabdebhya ityataḥ prāgvakṣyamāṇāḥ pratyayā vibhaktisaṃjñāḥ syuḥ //
GS24varlghku:7288: kimaḥ kuḥ syāttādau hādau ca vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24varlghku:7331: dādau prāgdiśīye sarvasya so vā syāt /
GS24varlghku:7341: idamśabdasya eta it ityādeśau stau rephādau thakārādau ca prāgdiśīye pare/
GS24varlghku:7348: eta it etau stau rephādau thādau ca prāgdiśīye /
GS24varlghku:7371: kima edantāttiṅo'vyayācca yo ghastadantādāmuḥ syānna tu dravyaprakarṣe /
GS24varlghku:7391: bahorlopo bhū ca bahoḥ // VLk_1230 = P_6,4.158 //
GS24varlghku:7395: bahoḥ parasya iṣṭhasya lopaḥ syād yiḍāgamaśca /
GS24varlghku:7407: vibhāṣā supo bahuc purastāttu // VLk_1234 = P_5,3.68 //
GS24varlghku:7408: īṣadasamāptiviśiṣṭer'the subantādbahujvā syātsa ca prāgeva na tu parataḥ /
GS24varlghku:7427: kiṃyattado nirdhāraṇe dvayorekasya ḍatarac // VLk_1239 = P_5,3.92 //
GS24varlghku:7430: vā bahūnāṃ jātiparipraśne ḍatamac // VLk_1240 = P_5,3.93 //
GS24varlghku:7432: bahūnāṃ madhye ekasya nirdhāraṇe ḍatamajvā syāt /
GS24varlghku:7468: vikārātmatāṃ prāpnuvatyāṃ prakṛtau vartamānādvikāraśabdāt svārthe cvirvā syātkarotyādibhiryoge//
GS24varlghku:7472: akṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃpadyate taṃ karoti kṛṣṇīkaroti /
GS24varlghku:7488: dvyajevāvaraṃ nyūnaṃ na tu tato nyūnamanekājiti yāvat /
GS24varlghku:7493: ḍācparaṃ yadāmreḍitaṃ tasminpare pūrvaparayorvarṇayoḥ pararūpaṃ syāt /
GS24varlghku:7510: ajādīnāmakārāntasya ca vācyaṃ yat strītvaṃ tatra dyotye ṭāp syāt /
GS24varlghku:7530: anupasardanaṃ yaṭṭidādi tadantaṃ yadadantaṃ prātipadikaṃ tataḥ striyāṃ ṅīpsyāt /
GS24varlghku:7556: halaḥ parasya taddhitayakārasyopadhābhūtasya sopa īti pare / gārgī //
GS24varlghku:7558: yañantāt ṣpho vā syātsa ca taddhitaḥ //
GS24varlghku:7589: yā pumākhyā puṃyogāt striyāṃ vartate tato ṅīṣ /
GS24varlghku:7593: pratyayasthātkātpūrvasyākārasyekāraḥ syādāpi sa āpsupaḥ paro na cet /
GS24varlghku:7637: asaṃyogopadhamupasarjanaṃ yat svāṅgaṃ tadantādadantān ṅīṣvā syāt /
GS24varlghku:7649: pūrvapadasthānnimittātparasya nasya ṇaḥ syāt saṃjñāyāṃ na tu gakāravyavadhāne /
GS24varlghku:7655: jātivāci yanna ca striyāṃ niyatamayopadhaṃ tataḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ syāt /
GS24varlghku:7695: yuvañchabdāt striyāṃ tiḥ pratyayaḥ syāt / yuvatiḥ //
